dict.acceptation: 构成，组成；制定，设立；等同于；指派；

sent.orig: According to the statistics. women constitute nearly fifths of the work force.
sent.trans: 根据统计数据。妇女占整个劳动力的近五分之二。

sent.orig: Then constitute an additional catalyst platinum category.
sent.trans: 然后再附加白金类催化剂构成。

sent.orig: The government is passing a resolution to constitute a committee to address the problem.
sent.trans: 政府正在通过决议，成立一个委员会来负责这个问题。

sent.orig: Similarly, our youths gathered together constitute a period of brilliance.
sent.trans: 我们汇集的青春也撑起这一段灿烂的岁月。

sent.orig: There are 6 biweekly problem sets. These homework assignments constitute 40% of the course grade.
sent.trans: 每两周指定一次作业，一共有6次。家庭作业将占课程总成绩的40%。
